name: Deal With Those Papers
description:
You are usual office worker, tones of never ending paper work to do.. But, that's tiring,.. find ways to keep yourself alive, don't get tired to the death and deal with those paper by any means necessarily, put it onto other tables, throw it into the trash, microwave (?),...

Control:
WASD - to move around
E - to interact with objects

UI:
- Left:
  - Paper Stack Meter. If it's reach max capacity - you're gonna be fired
- Top:
  - Timer. How long are you alive on this job
- Right:
  - Tired Meter. If it's reach max capacity - you're gonna be tired to the death

Ludum Dare 46:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/deal-with-those-papers

Development process: 
https://twitch.tv/mowemax
